author: Evgeny Lebedev, Evgeny Lebedev
title: While the world reels from coronavirus, the next pandemic is waiting in the wings
description: Stop The Wildlife Trade: Zoonotic diseases represent a real and present threat to the modern world – after failing to address the danger for centuries, we must act now
content:
The mountains are high and the emperor is far away, goes the Chinese proverb. Over the years, the chorus of warnings on the wildlife trade and sale of live animals has steadily grown louder.
For too long, governments across the world have made overtures to c… [+3479 chars]
